extendedInfo.description: Shopping Lists is an app designed to replace "traditional pen & paper" shopping lists.This app is useful and simple. You can manage several differents lists and you can add, mark or delete any items in each of them.This app includes a configurable widget.

reviews.title: It\'s now AWESOME
reviews.comment: The only improvement I had wanted to see was that once you\'ve put a widget up of a certain list, when you click it, it would go straight into that list for adding/crossing off.And you made it so. So i\'ve upgraded to 5 stars! MUCH more useful now thank you!!
reviews.author: Daniel C

reviews.title: Beautifully simple
reviews.comment: Does everything you need, and no more. Widget is great. Like the chance to have several lists, eg groceries,  eBay, etc. Thank you!
reviews.author: Barry Kane

reviews.title: almost perfect
reviews.comment: If you can make a shopping list to be copied into a new shopping list, i will give you 5 stars.  Even better, if we can add picture to a list,  i\'ll rate you 7 stars \360\237\230\203
reviews.author: Nirma Yuliansyah

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app ... would be good if you could add the function so a list could be worked on from either tablet or phone
reviews.author: Leroy Morris

reviews.title: Needs sort function
reviews.comment: Coming from iPhone this app is the closest to my fave shopping list app ShopShop. Just missing sort (alphabetical is fine) and option to move crossed off items to the bottom of the list ;) also to not allow multiple items e.g. if I try and enter \"tomatoes\" twice then I have 2 items instead of it recognising that I\'ve used that item before
reviews.author: Elle Billias

reviews.title: Clean & simple
reviews.comment: Works great! No dealing with a mess of options I don\'t use!
reviews.author: Alisa Parrish

reviews.title: Covers what is needed
reviews.comment: Simple and to the point. Useful though I\'d like to be able to change the in-app colour.
reviews.author: David G

reviews.comment: Perfect!
reviews.author: Becky Pollard

reviews.title: GREAT UPDATES!!
reviews.comment: These recent updates are GREAT! Updating my lists are so much easier.  I really like the new theme,  but it would really be nice to have optional themes.  Nonetheless,  THANKS YOU again for these updates!
reviews.author: Toran Lewis

reviews.title: Great!  Very useful and easy to use
reviews.comment: Theonly real functionality missing is to be able to show only items marked in thlist and hide others

reviews.title: NOT FULLY LOADED WITH APPLICATION
reviews.comment: I just want say that, \'There is NO TICK mark after the particular item is checked.\' So it is very difficult to identify which item is purchased or checked
reviews.author: FREDDY HOTELWALA

reviews.title: LG Motion
reviews.comment: Great app! Give it an ics look, and let me rearrange my lists and it\'s a 5 star app for sure. Hint, Hint! ;)
reviews.author: Jason Wilson

reviews.title: Just right!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for! I wanted a quick and sImple way to make a basic list of stuff I wanted to pick up at the store, and this app does that perfectly. The fact that it also looks great is a bonus. Highly recommend for anyone who wants a quick and easy way to make a list and doesn\'t need/want a bunch of confusing features that they\'ll never use.
reviews.author: Diane Roe

reviews.title: Great but that little pop-up over the keyboard is annoying!
reviews.comment: Love this app & the widget but FFS, WHY that irritating pop-up confirmation over the keyboard after every new list is created or every item is added to a list? It inactivates the keyboard for just long enough to seriously slow me down. Also, list doesn\'t scroll above the keyboard as it gets longer. PLEASE fix these issues as they are detrimental to productivity.
reviews.author: Sato Joko

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Its beautiful and exactly what I was looking for. I live how you can make multiple lists. :)
reviews.author: Anna M

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Is there any version without ads?
reviews.author: Ana Carolina Villarroel

reviews.title: disappointed
reviews.comment: NO WIDGET ON MY TABLET=UNINSTALL+1STAR
reviews.author: Al P

reviews.title: Shopping list
reviews.comment: Love the app. Very lite and works smoothly. Happy to be able to delete each item as it is placed in the cart. Using Samsung Galaxy lll.   Thanks much
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!!
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for.  Love you can put the list on your home screen.
reviews.author: Kimberly Singleton

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: Needs backup feature
reviews.author: Marlene Fay Riggio
